TextLibrary.Text: You failed to defeat the Ogre Mage. You will need to try again.
The Guard chases you away, but it is doubtful Grullkar would talk to you again anyway.
You defeat the Guard, but Gruulkar will still not talk with you.
You must travel to Gruuldok and talk with Gruulkar.
You must search throughout Kor for another way to stop Gruulkar.
A Huge Orc Champion blocks your way to Gruulkar. It doesn't look like you'll be speaking to him any more.
Perhaps the Ogres here have an idea of how to stop Gruulkar...
You have failed to stop Gruulkar from going to war, but you have gathered some useful information.
This Champion is extremely well-armored and can Headbutt just like an Orc Lord.
